Text.val: This program tests every month if the automatic deletion of debtors and limits
18.07.2011 JH SCR16622 Changed argument PI.PRINTFORM from 'N' to GSBU_YESNO
25.05.2010 SH SCR15555 Added PI.FCIONLY and test on DEBC to call BDC305
06.05.2010 SH SCR15514 Removed test on CLNT212_FCI = 0
13.04.2010 SH SCR15431 Replaced hardcoded jobqueue names by logical names and
changed call of BDC305 to submit serverjob to be able to run in queue night max
03.02.2010 GB SCR15302 Extended test for CALENDAR and selection
02.01.2008 GB SCR13254 Added test is rows exists in CALENDER
21.12.2005 SH SCR9860 Added PI.CLIENTLIMITCODE = '' to argument list of BDC305
04.04.2005 MW SCR#8064 --> Changed argument 'pi.printform' from 'Y' to 'N'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/CALD where CALD_STD_WEEKLY = 'Y' and CALD_STD_MONTHLY = 'N' and CALD_DATE > date(:2) and MONTH(CALD_DATE) = :3 and YEAR(CALD_DATE) = :4 or CALD_STD_MONTHLY = 'Y' and CALD_DATE = date(:2)
